title: Semester Examination Schedule
body: The schedule for the upcoming semester examinations has been released. Please check the attachment for detailed timings and dates.

title: Lab Practical for 3rd Year CSE
body: The practical examination for the Data Structures lab is scheduled for next week. Batches will be notified by the department.

title: Guideline for Re-evaluation
body: Students seeking re-evaluation of their answer sheets must apply through the university portal within 7 days of result declaration.
